class_notes: This section is taught within the "Play Fusion" model. A variety of out of class activities are required in lieu of a portion of the in class meetings for instruction see http://recwell.emory.edu/physical_education/play_fusion.html
course_description: This class is designed for students with little or no climbing experience and moderate fitness.  Students will learn to climb, belay, and rappel safely in the gym. The cross-training portion encompasses a variety of cardio, strength, and flexibility group exercise sessions.
schedule_location: TTh 1pm-2:15pm in Woodruff PE Center- Atrium
